title: Before the Legend
description: Things will never be the same after the dream. NeverOn the quiet island, amidst the looming Roman Empire, Troy, the youngest son of the King has always known his little world to be safe and happy. But one nightmare gives him a disturbing glimpse of losing his parents forever. He wakes up only to realize he may have lost something else―his parent’s love and affection. Left with more questions than answers, Troy must figure out the new questions that the event has triggered. But in three days, an earthshattering event rocks the island, separating him and his brothers from their parents. If Troy doesn't find his parents in time, his worst nightmare is about to come true. But if he does, will he be prepared for what he's about to discover?
author: J.U. Scribe
